function_configuration.description: Paper acquisition with streaming download and S3 upload capabilities

performance_rationale.memory: 1024MB for handling large PDF downloads (up to 100MB) with streaming and retry logic.
performance_rationale.timeout: 300 seconds (5 minutes) to handle large file downloads and multiple retry attempts.
performance_rationale.cold_start_optimization: AWS clients initialized outside handler for reuse across invocations.
